title: torch.utils.ffi--“cuda.h”: No such file or directory
body_html:
Issue description

error

c:\anaconda2\envs\python3\lib\site-packages\torch\lib\include\thc\THCGeneral.h(12): fatal error C1083: can not open or include such file: “cuda.h”: No such file or directory
Provide a short description.

Code example

i encounter this error when i run the example provided by
https://pytorch.org/tutorials/advanced/c_extension.html
and
https://pytorch.org/docs/stable/notes/windows.html#cffi-extension

System Info

win10+python3.6.1+pytorch0.4.0

  • PyTorch or Caffe2:

body:
## Issue description
error 

c:\anaconda2\envs\python3\lib\site-packages\torch\lib\include\thc\THCGeneral.h(12): fatal error C1083: can not open or include such file: “cuda.h”: No such file or directory
Provide a short description.

## Code example
i encounter this error when i run the example provided by 
https://pytorch.org/tutorials/advanced/c_extension.html
and
https://pytorch.org/docs/stable/notes/windows.html#cffi-extension

## System Info
